A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is by far my favorite franchise and I wanted to like this movie. However\, it seemed more like a loose Marvel Movie than a Star Wars movie. The actors did a great job with what they were given to read\, but the movie failed to provide character development for some of the most important protagonists. My expectations are of course much higher for a Star Wars film\, but I was disappointed because it felt sloppy and rushed.
